alert.note: Alert for La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 10:59AM EST until January 23 at 6:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow continues. A brief lull in the snow is expected into the early afternoon hours before a lake effect snow band potentially moves into the area by mid to late afternoon. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches will be possible with this lake effect snow band. * WHERE...La Porte County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Most untreated or unplowed roads will likely become snow covered and slippery. Travel over most areas Sunday is likely to be impacted.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
